channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dietician says 'make this food swap to lower risk of diabetes and bowel cancer'
item.description: The British Heart Foundation's senior dietitian explained how the diet swap could help to improve health

item.title: 'I refused to give up my extra plane seat for a toddler - but I had good reason'
item.description: A woman has shared how she refused to give up her plane seat so an almost two-year-old boy could sit down on a flight - and people agree she was right...

item.title: Shop owner makes 50 citizen’s arrests because shoplifting at his store is so bad
item.description: Martin Gaunt fights back against retail crime through unexpected method

item.title: ‘Mosh pit nappy’ released to help people avoid long queues for the loo at gigs
item.description: It comes after a number of incidents of fans refusing to leave the pit at shows...under any circumstances.

item.title: North Korea has an embassy in the UK and it's well-hidden on a residential road
item.description: North Korea's embassy in the UK is not easy to spot, but it's been hidden in plain sight for nearly 20 years - and here's what it looks like inside

item.title: Chicken gets her own hi-vis jacket to help cross the road
item.description: Billie used to follow kids to school.

item.title: Builders pour concrete over newly built bus stand and now nobody can use it
item.description: People are working out how to sit properly on the submerged seats.

item.title: UK snow maps show huge Arctic blast set to batter millions of Brits on New Year's Day
item.description: Advanced weather modelling maps suggest the UK will be engulfed by snow on New Year's Day, with several major cities set to welcome the white stuff

item.title: Exact size of a 'sliver' of cake as Brits told to never ask for one
item.description: A new survey has revealed what Brits really mean when they use phrases like 'small slice', 'a little piece', 'a sliver', 'a tiny piece', 'a taste' and...

item.title: Cop resigns after moonlighting as porn star to pay $500,000 bills
